summary: ON A 2003 GMC ENVOY XL (VEHICLE MILEAGE APPROX. 8900 MILES), THE WINDSHIELD WIPERS WERE ON WHEN THE SWITCH WAS IN THE OFF POSITION.  THE DEALER REPLACED THE WIPER MOTOR.  THIS WAS THE SECOND TIME THIS PROBLEM HAD OCCURRED; THE FIRST WAS IN SEPTEMBER 2002.  AT THAT TIME, THE DEALER ALSO REPLACED THE WIPER MOTOR.
